# EnvironmentResource.CreateOptions.SamplingQuality.veryHigh

**Case**

Computes the environment textures with very high sampling rates.

## Declaration

```swift
case veryHigh
```

## Discussion

Use only to capture very small frequency details in the specular texture.



## Sampling qualities

- **EnvironmentResource.CreateOptions.SamplingQuality.fast**: Computes the environment textures with small sampling rates.
- **EnvironmentResource.CreateOptions.SamplingQuality.normal**: Computes the environment textures with regular sampling rates.
- **EnvironmentResource.CreateOptions.SamplingQuality.high**: Computes the environment textures with high sampling rates, reducing texture noise in high-frequency areas.
